## Try it out

Run the cells below.

```{r tbl-car-df}
mtcars %>%
  head() %>%
  select(-drat, -qsec, -wt) %>% 
  knitr::kable(caption = "My car dataframe")
```

```{r fig.cap="Car weight vs MPG"}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(aspect.ratio = 0.8) +
  labs(title = "Car Weight vs MPG",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon")
```

From the command-line, run `Rscript -e "rmarkdown::render('notebook.Rmd')"` or use the "Knit" button in RStudio to render this.
